text: @AyannaPressley They would like us to forget his impeachment.The fact the GOP -1 crowned him king with their no vote to convict Allowing covid19 used as a weapon our troops have bounties on their heads and thousands dead from covid19 and rogue police as they lie or stay silent won't be forgotten
